item.title: Trump To Skip US Supreme Court Hearings On Tariffs: ‘I Wanted To Go So Badly’
item.description: An unfavorable ruling in the case could jeopardize trade talks with many of America’s trading partners and deal a blow to Trump’s economic agenda.

item.title: Your Holiday Spending Just Got A Lot Pricier — By Nearly $29B — Thanks To Trump's Tariffs
item.description: Retailers absorb billions too as trade costs ripple through store shelves.

item.title: Nio Smashes Delivery Record As Onvo L90 Demand Soars — Retail Hopes For Fresh Breakout
item.description: Nio posted a strong monthly sales performance in October, outpacing its major domestic peers.

item.title: Sam Altman Says Elon Musk Left OpenAI 'For Dead' After Tesla CEO Accuses Him Of Stealing A Nonprofit
item.description: The latest clash between the tech titans comes after OpenAI’s shift to a for-profit structure and Altman’s jab over Tesla refund delays.

item.title: FDA Turmoil Spills Over To Aurinia Pharma As Lawsuit Targets Ex-Drug Review Chief — Retail Traders Cry ‘Stock Manipulation’
